cross: Cymbidium Hazel Tyers 'Santa Maria' x Cymbidium Satin Dragon 'Cinnabar'

measurements.description: Nineteen full well-proportioned flowers and four buds on two inflorescences, longest 70cm; sepals and petals pale green, fine maroon speckling, denser distally; unusual cream-colored lip, overlaid broad rose band distally, darkening to maroon band apically; column rose, ventral surface spotted burgundy, anther cap yellow; substance firm; texture matte.
